page.title: 18HOTELS
page.content:
There are two hotels in our rectangle. One is Penhaven Hotel and the other is Foxdown Manor.
{Penhaven}is a very nice hotel, it has a good bar, a nice restaurant, a dinning room, bedrooms and in most rooms they have a bathroom. There is a wood near the hotel. The people who own Penhaven are called Maxine and Alan Wade. They have a reception desk on the right as you go in the door.
{ Foxdown}is a nice big hotel as well. It has a croquet pitch, a big wood about the same as Penhavens; they have a restaurant, a bar, and they have a childrens' play ground too.
